title: Trump says GOP memo's contents on FBI, DoJ 'a disgrace'
text:
Trump says GOP memo's contents on FBI, DoJ 'a disgrace' 1:27am IST - 00:51 
President Donald Trump said on Friday the contents of a controversial Republican memo tell a disgraceful story and that ''a lot of people should be ashamed.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Donald Trump said on Friday the contents of a controversial Republican memo tell a disgraceful story and that "a lot of people should be ashamed." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/02/trump-says-gop-memos-contents-on-fbi-doj?videoId=390455971&videoChannel=13423
